comment: /** * An adaptor method to returns the absorbance (optical density) of sequence. The sequence argument * must be a protein sequence consisting of only non-ambiguous characters. * The computation of absorbance (optical density) follows the * documentation in here. * * @param sequence * a protein sequence consisting of non-ambiguous characters only * @param assumeCysReduced * true if Cys are assumed to be reduced and false if Cys are assumed to form cystines * @return the absorbance (optical density) of sequence */
